about_the_game:
THIS GAME CONTAINS A TRANS MALE CHARACTER. If you can't accept the fact we have ONE trans male guy in this game when we have a universe with more than 50 cisgender ones, get another game. If you can't accept it at all, you are not welcome here. Plus, you can support other gay studios that are only interested in getting your money instead of making a better world. Male Doll is a brand about creating something meaningful for Queer community; we make games that connect with our experiences, and we want to be honest about that. We support trans people; we have trans people on our team, so don't waste our time sending negative reviews only about this representation. That isn't a critique; it's transphobia.



Action, Tower Defence, LGBT, Gay, Bara, Yaoi, Colorful, Comedy



Doll Defenders is an action tower defense game in the Male Doll multiverse where you must protect the sacred statue from monsters, all while meeting heroes and unlocking NSFW scenes/animations on your way to the final boss. Prepare for a unique and fun gameplay mechanic that introduces players to some members of our cast.


  • 3 different worlds with 15 levels and 78 waves to fight!
  • 3 bosses to defeat!
  • 8 characters to save!
  • 11 NSFW Pixel Art Animations in which ONE IS MALE TRANSGENDER GAY GUY!
  • 8 Pixel Art Scenes in which ONE IS MALE TRANSGENDER GAY GUY!
  • Endless Mode with Leaderboard!
  • 12 different weapons to fit your playstyle!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains irony and some people may be offended by it. Also, it contains sexual animations between men and men and monsters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

short_description: You were teleported to Male Doll's multiverse with one goal: to meet some of our heroes. However, you may find them having private moments. Can you complete the challenges, or will your attention be on their sexual performances? Don't lie to yourself! THIS GAME CONTAINS A TRANS MALE CHARACTER!
